titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on 50/50 mixture of 1,3,5-Triazine-2,4,6(1H,3H,5H)-trione, 1,3,5-tris[(2R)-oxiranylmethyl]-(9Cl) and 1,3,5,-Triazine-2,4,6(1H,3H,5H)-trione, 1,3,5-tris[(2S)-oxiranylmethyl]-(9Cl).

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 6/6/2006--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on 50/50 mixture of 1,3,5-Triazine-2,4,6(1H,3H,5H)-trione, 1,3,5-tris[(2R)-oxiranylmethyl]-(9Cl) and 1,3,5,-Triazine-2,4,6(1H,3H,5H)-trione, 1,3,5-tris[(2S)-oxiranylmethyl]-(9Cl).
